generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and street lamps.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections, mounted on poles.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign indicating a mandatory direction.
- vegetation: Some vegetation, including small bushes and trees, is visible along the sidewalks and in front of buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the image, riding a bicycle.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: Two cars are visible on the road, one red and one dark-colored.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
